title: 新约 - 哥林多前书(1 Corinthians) - 第 12 章
subTitle: 新约 -- 哥林多前书(1 Corinthians) -- 第 12 章 ( 本篇共有 16 章 )

lineList.en: Now concerning spiritual gifts, brethren, I would not have you ignorant.
lineList.cn: 弟兄们，论到属灵的恩赐，我不愿意你们不明白。

lineList.en: Ye know that ye were Gentiles, carried away unto these dumb idols, even as ye were led.
lineList.cn: 你们作外邦人的时候，随事被牵引受迷惑，去服事那哑吧偶像。这是你们知道的。

lineList.en: Wherefore I give you to understand, that no man speaking by the Spirit of God calleth Jesus accursed: and that no man can say that Jesus is the Lord, but by the Holy Ghost.
lineList.cn: 所以我告诉你们，被神的灵感动的，没有说耶稣是可咒诅的。若不是被圣灵感动的，也没有能说耶稣是主的。

lineList.en: Now there are diversities of gifts, but the same Spirit.
lineList.cn: 恩赐原有分别，圣灵却是一位。

lineList.en: And there are differences of administrations, but the same Lord.
lineList.cn: 职事也有分别，主却是一位。

lineList.en: And there are diversities of operations, but it is the same God which worketh all in all.
lineList.cn: 功用也有分别，神却是一位，在众人里面运行一切的事。

lineList.en: But the manifestation of the Spirit is given to every man to profit withal.
lineList.cn: 圣灵显在各人身上，是叫人得益处。

lineList.en: For to one is given by the Spirit the word of wisdom; to another the word of knowledge by the same Spirit;
lineList.cn: 这人蒙圣灵赐他智慧的言语。那人也蒙这位圣灵赐他知识的言语。

lineList.en: To another faith by the same Spirit; to another the gifts of healing by the same Spirit;
lineList.cn: 又有一人蒙这位圣灵赐他信心。还有一人蒙这位圣灵赐他医病的恩赐。

lineList.en: To another the working of miracles; to another prophecy; to another discerning of spirits; to another divers kinds of tongues; to another the interpretation of tongues:
lineList.cn: 又有一人能行异能。又叫一人能作先知。又叫一人能辨别诸灵。又叫一人能说方言。又叫一人能翻方言。

lineList.en: But all these worketh that one and the selfsame Spirit, dividing to every man severally as he will.
lineList.cn: 这一切都是这位圣灵所运行，随己意分给各人的。

lineList.en: For as the body is one, and hath many members, and all the members of that one body, being many, are one body: so also is Christ.
lineList.cn: 就如身子是一个，却有许多肢体。而且肢体虽多，仍是一个身子。基督也是这样。

lineList.en: For by one Spirit are we all baptized into one body, whether we be Jews or Gentiles, whether we be bond or free; and have been all made to drink into one Spirit.
lineList.cn: 我们不拘是犹太人，是希腊人，是为奴的，是自主的，都从一位圣灵受洗，成了一个身体。饮于一位圣灵。

lineList.en: For the body is not one member, but many.
lineList.cn: 身子原不是一个肢体，乃是许多肢体。

lineList.en: If the foot shall say, Because I am not the hand, I am not of the body; is it therefore not of the body?
lineList.cn: 设若脚说，我不是手，所以不属乎身子。他不能因此就不属乎身子。

lineList.en: And if the ear shall say, Because I am not the eye, I am not of the body; is it therefore not of the body?
lineList.cn: 设若耳说，我不是眼，所以不属乎身子。他也不能因此就不属乎身子。

lineList.en: If the whole body were an eye, where were the hearing? If the whole were hearing, where were the smelling?
lineList.cn: 若全身是眼，从那里听声呢。若全身是耳，从那里闻味呢。

lineList.en: But now hath God set the members every one of them in the body, as it hath pleased him.
lineList.cn: 但如今神随自己的意思，把肢体俱各安排在身上。

lineList.en: And if they were all one member, where were the body?
lineList.cn: 若都是一个肢体，身子在那里呢。

lineList.en: But now are they many members, yet but one body.
lineList.cn: 但如今肢体是多的，身子却是一个。

lineList.en: And the eye cannot say unto the hand, I have no need of thee: nor again the head to the feet, I have no need of you.
lineList.cn: 眼不能对手说，我用不着你。头也不能对脚说，我用不着你。

lineList.en: Nay, much more those members of the body, which seem to be more feeble, are necessary:
lineList.cn: 不但如此，身上肢体人以为软弱的，更是不可少的。

lineList.en: And those members of the body, which we think to be less honourable, upon these we bestow more abundant honour; and our uncomely parts have more abundant comeliness.
lineList.cn: 身上肢体，我们看为不体面的，越发给他加上体面。不俊美的，越发得着俊美。

lineList.en: For our comely parts have no need: but God hath tempered the body together, having given more abundant honour to that part which lacked:
lineList.cn: 我们俊美的肢体，自然用不着装饰。但神配搭这身子，把加倍的体面给那有缺欠的肢体。

lineList.en: That there should be no schism in the body; but that the members should have the same care one for another.
lineList.cn: 免得身上分门别类。总要肢体彼此相顾。

lineList.en: And whether one member suffer, all the members suffer with it; or one member be honoured, all the members rejoice with it.
lineList.cn: 若一个肢体受苦，所有的肢体就一同受苦。若一个肢体得荣耀，所有的肢体就一同快乐。

lineList.en: Now ye are the body of Christ, and members in particular.
lineList.cn: 你们就是基督的身子，并且各作肢体。

lineList.en: And God hath set some in the church, first apostles, secondarily prophets, thirdly teachers, after that miracles, then gifts of healings, helps, governments, diversities of tongues.
lineList.cn: 神在教会所设立的，第一是使徒。第二是先知，第三是教师。其次是行异能的。再次是得恩赐医病的。帮助人的。治理事的。说方言的。

lineList.en: Are all apostles? are all prophets? are all teachers? are all workers of miracles?
lineList.cn: 岂都是使徒吗。岂都是先知吗。岂都是教师吗。岂都是行异能的吗。

lineList.en: Have all the gifts of healing? do all speak with tongues? do all interpret?
lineList.cn: 岂都是得恩赐医病的吗。岂都是说方言的吗。岂都是翻方言的吗。

lineList.en: But covet earnestly the best gifts: and yet shew I unto you a more excellent way.
lineList.cn: 你们要切切的求那更大的恩赐，我现今把最妙的道指示你们。
